text: == Events == * March 16 - Edward, the Black Prince is crowned Duke of Cornwall. * The Hundred Years' War (c. 1337â€“1453) begins between France and England. * Philip VI of France confiscates Aquitaine. == Births == * Louis II, Duke of Bourbon (d. 1410) == Deaths == * January 8 - Giotto di Bondone, Italian Painter (b. 1267) * June 7 - William III, Count of Hainaut * June 25 - Frederick III of Sicily (b. 1272) * date unknown ** Mansa Musa, 14th century King of the Malinese Empire :Also see :Category:1337 deaths . == Other websites == * Prime Curios *
